title: Interpretation of a dream about a cooking competition

Interpretation of a dream about a cooking competition in a dream The vision of going to a cooking competition to obtain some material gains that the dreamer achieves in those days. If one sees that he went to a cooking competition, this may indicate good changes that may occur in the dreamer's life in the coming period. Seeing a cooking competition in a dream may indicate a job that the dreamer will get or a promotion at work, God willing. Seeing a cooking competition in a dream may indicate the success that the dreamer will achieve during this period, and God knows best. When a person sees a Quran competition in a dream, this may indicate a blessing and happiness in life during this time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of seeing fire in a grave and the meaning of visions of open graves

preview.html: Many people search for interpretations of their dreams in their dreams, such as the interpretation of seeing fire in the grave. Many dream scholars and interpreters have interpreted seeing fire coming out of graves and seeing fire in general and including the complete dream interpretation for this vision. Interpretation of seeing fire in a grave. Interpreters have interpreted a vision of fire on a grave as saying that when a person sees that he is walking on a grave from which fire is coming out abundantly and powerfully, this is evidence. However, he will soon fall into temptation in real life. If a woman sees fire rising from the grave passing by her, then this vision shows how quickly she will fall into immorality and evil, so she needs attention and attention in her real life. Whoever sees a grave with fire coming out of it, and this grave is very close to him This indicates that the dreamer is imprisoned due to a major problem. Commentators said that the interpretation of seeing fire in a grave generally indicates many crises and problems in the dreamer’s life. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of seeing fire in a dreamInterpretation of seeing open graves in a dreamCommentators’ article on the interpretation of a vision Fire in the grave: Seeing a grave in a dream generally means imprisonment as a result of a major problem in real life. Whoever sees himself in the grave while he is alive, this indicates imprisonment. In the near future, and whoever sees that he was placed in the grave and died, this vision shows his destruction in reality due to the crises and problems that he faces. Whoever dreams in a dream that one of the princes placed him in the grave indicates that he will be imprisoned very soon, but if he sees himself in the grave and is not lost This vision is praiseworthy and indicates an escape from prison. . Sheikh Ibn Shirin said in his interpretation of the vision of fire in the grave that when a person sees that he is being placed in the grave due to an active action, then this vision shows the corruption of religion and failure to follow the straight path. The command of our God. And whoever sees himself buried in the grave with energy and emerges from it safe and sound, this vision indicates that the dreamer will return from an inappropriate path that he was walking, repent, and return to God, Blessed and Most High, and God Almighty knows best. Other interpretations: Whoever sees in a dream that he is throwing dirt or throwing dirt on A buried person, this vision indicates that this person will be the cause of many problems, misfortunes and destruction for the buried person. It was said in the interpretation of seeing fire in graves that when you see a cemetery or an open grave, this vision indicates imprisonment. And whoever sees that he visits graves and repeats the visit, this indicates To visit the prison and visit the prisoners, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees that he entered an area and sees many graves, and the dreamer does not know the owners of these graves, then this indicates that the residents of this area are dominated by gossip and hypocrisy. In the same case, if he sees one abandoned, unknown grave For its owner, this vision indicates that the owner of the vision will get involved with those who face hypocrisy. Whoever dreams that he built a grave or sees a grave on the roof of his house, this vision indicates longevity and continuity of work for the owner of the vision. You may also be interested in: Interpretation of seeing yourself extinguishing a fire In a dream, the meaning of seeing fire in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing freckles in a dream and dreaming of freckles appearing

preview.html: Seeing freckles in a dream symbolizes the sins and transgressions that the dreamer commits for the sake of gains and profits. Whoever sees freckles appearing on his face in a dream, this indicates the loss of modesty, the revelation of concealment, and the appearance of freckles on his face. Someone else's face in a dream indicates the emergence of hidden enmities, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing freckles in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that seeing freckles in a dream is one of the sins that the dreamer commits with people for the sake of money. Whoever sees freckles on his body in a dream, this indicates a lack of status and position among people, and seeing many brown spots on the body in a dream indicates submission and humiliation to others to reach the extreme limits, and they call freckles in a dream generally indicates illness. Al-Nabulsi says that seeing freckles in a dream means corruption of religion and morals, and whoever sees freckles in a dream, this indicates overcoming taboos and impurities, and seeing large freckles in a dream means committing immorality, and whoever sees black freckles on his body in a dream, this indicates anxiety and sadness. Gustav Miller says that if a woman dreams that her face is full of freckles in a dream, this means that she is facing problems that end her happiness and make her live in misery. Interpretation of the appearance of freckles on the face in a dream Seeing freckles appearing on the face in a dream indicates the disappearance of modesty and uncovering the face. Whoever sees brown spots appearing A large freckle on his face in a dream indicates a loss of status and position among people, and seeing the appearance of black spots on the face in a dream means that he is doing vile and despicable acts, dreaming of the appearance of freckles and his appearance was beautiful indicates an improvement in conditions. Seeing freckles on your forehead in a dream means a lack of honor, and if you see a lot of freckles on your forehead in a dream, this means a bad life and bad conditions. Anyone who sees freckles spreading on his right cheek in a dream indicates a lack of religion, and seeing freckles appear on his left cheek in a dream indicates a problem with a family member. Interpretation of seeing a face in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of freckles appearing on a person's face Seeing freckles appearing on someone else's face in a dream indicates the emergence of hidden hostility, and whoever sees freckles appearing on the face of the person you are talking to in a dream indicates exposure to deception and listening to hypocrisy. Whoever sees freckles on his girlfriend's face in a dream, this indicates his lies and hypocrisy, and seeing freckles on his brother's face in a dream indicates the corruption of his actions, and the dream of brown spots appearing on her face indicates her sister. The appearance of freckles on the face of someone you know in a dream indicates his evil and harm, and whoever sees that he is mocking someone he knows because of the appearance of freckles on his face in a dream, this indicates the occurrence of disputes and problems with him. Seeing in a dream the appearance of brown spots on the face of a relative indicates the cunning of those close to him, and if you see the appearance of freckles on the face of a relative and then they disappear in the dream, this indicates the outbreak of hostility from relatives that will not last, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the appearance of freckles on the forearm Seeing freckles on the forearm in a dream indicates harm to children, and whoever sees freckles appearing on his right forearm in a dream

title: What is the interpretation of pronouncing the Shahada in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of pronouncing the Shahada in a dream is evidence of a person who sees the fear of God (Glory be to Him). Interpretation of a dream of pronouncing the Shahada in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of pronouncing a Shahada in a dream for an old woman is evidence of the return of one who has been absent for a period of time, and speaking a Shahada in a dream for a married woman, if it was before the dream. Pure and slept with him. Performing ablution, this is evidence of the end of the dispute with a friend, and the interpretation of pronouncing the Shahada in a dream for a young man is evidence of success and success in his life. Pronunciation of the Death Shahada in a Dream Still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Saying the two Shahadas after death in a dream for an unmarried girl is evidence of success and success in her life, and for a married woman it is evidence of kindness and livelihood soon. Saying the Shahada after death in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence of natural birth Easy, and for a divorced woman, it is evidence of her marriage to a righteous man who fears God and lives with him in happiness and stability. As for the dream of an old woman if she is suffering from an illness, this is evidence of a short recovery and recovery from this disease, God willing, and saying the Shahada after death in a dream on the authority of a man is evidence of that. If an unmarried girl dreams of dying and pronouncing the Shahada, this is evidence that she will soon hear happy news. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is dying and pronounces the Shahada, this is evidence of a natural birth. And that she will give birth to a child of extraordinary beauty that will dazzle all those present. A divorced woman’s dream of death and uttering martyrdom is evidence of this woman’s victory over her enemies in the near future. What if an old woman dreamed of death and uttered martyrdom? She was in good health. This is evidence of the loss of a loved one. Seeing death in a dream, and martyrdom For a man who has debts, this is evidence that these debts will be paid soon, and if he is a student of knowledge, this is evidence that this person has reached the highest levels. Torture in a dream Seeing martyrdom in a dream is a vision worthy of praise in most dreams. If an unmarried girl dreams of someone who was martyred, This is evidence that she will soon hear good and happy news. If a married woman sees torture in a dream, this is a sign of kindness and support for this wife soon, and torture in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of natural childbirth, but she will stumble and this woman will give birth. A beautiful girl. Torturing a divorced woman in a dream is evidence that this woman will soon return to her ex-husband. As for the old woman, it indicates that she is suffering from an illness but will recover soon. Interpretation of a dream about the soul coming out and pronouncing testimony. Interpretation of a dream about the soul coming out and pronouncing testimony in a dream about a single girl is evidence of purity. This girl and her chastity, and she works justly, fears the punishment of God, and turns away from what God has. Forbidden. The interpretation of the dream of the departure of the soul and the testimony in a dream about a married woman is evidence of pregnancy soon with a male child, God willing. The pregnant woman has evidence of a natural and easy birth and will give birth to a male child, and the interpretation of the dream of the spirit

title: Learn about the reasons for Ibn Sirin seeing the Holy Prophet in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the Prophet in a dreamMany people want to see the Holy Prophet in a dream, as the Messenger said in an authentic hadith: “Whoever sees me in a dream has truly seen me, and the devil does not imitate me.” This is clear evidence of the greatness of seeing the Messenger in a dream and its impact on a person, as it makes him closer to the Creator - the Great and Great - and even the desire to display the qualities of the Messenger. May God bless him and grant him peace - as much as possible. Therefore, let us consider with you the details in a comprehensive and information-rich article about everything related to the reasons for seeing the Prophet in a dream, its interpretation, how you see it, and what is the confirmed vision for that, according to the opinions of jurists and interpreters. Reasons for seeing the Prophet in a dream There are many reasons that occur when seeing the Prophet in a dream. A dream, as we mentioned in the previous hadith that the Holy Messenger does not come to anyone in a dream unless it is his real image, as Satan does not dare to appear in a dream. The image of the Holy Prophet, so if the righteous one sees him, this is a sign that he has seen him. Many scholars of jurisprudence point out that dreams are divided into three categories: the first: dreams related to feelings rooted in the subconscious that appear in the form of successive events as a result of continuous thinking, and the second is related to the devil. Through which he wants to spread panic and fear in human souls and appear in the form of nightmares, the third type is the good visions that come from angels and which bring peace and tranquility to the souls of believers. And of course between them is seeing the Messenger - may God bless him and grant him peace. Interpretation of seeing the Messenger in a dream. The Egyptian site is the largest dream interpretation site in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google and get the correct interpretations. One of the most important reasons for seeing the Messenger in a dream is continuous thinking. With Him and His attributes, even performing various duties, submissive prayer, and sleeping in a state of purity, and that this vision carries some of His attributes, gentlemen. The Messenger: that is, he is seen from behind or from the side, or he is seen walking, as stated in the biographies. Aside from that, the vision that the Messenger spoke about in his noble hadith may not become fulfilled. If a person sees this in a dream, he must go to the senior sheikhs and scholars to narrate this vision and verify its authenticity, and whether it actually conveys a message or is it just emerging dreams. About constant thinking. The Noble Messenger, where the individual feels his uncontrollable desire to see Him and thus the mind works. The subconscious mind interprets these feelings and fulfills or satisfies the person’s desire and makes him see it in reality. How does one see the Prophet in a dream? Many people wonder about the ways or steps through which the Prophet - may God bless him and grant him peace - can be seen in a dream. Books and reports that talk about his noble qualities, his biography, as well as his own biography, as they make him feel the love of the Noble Messenger in his heart and always wish for this so that his soul longs and his subconscious mind translates and makes him see him in a dream. It was mentioned in Sahih Al-Albani on the authority of Abu Hurairah - may God be pleased with him - in an honorable hadith On the authority of the Holy Prophet

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling a house

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about selling a house in a dream and dreams and their meaning in the lives of many people. Tracking and running after the interpretation of dreams recently made it a source of a lot of searches on Google. We provide the interpretation of a dream when selling a house, whether the house is new or old. For example, selling a new house is proof of kindness and adequate diet. Selling an old house is not worthy of praise. In a dream. Follow these changes through the site. What is the interpretation of a dream about selling a house for single people? Seeing a house in a dream for an unmarried girl shows her morals, behavior, and lifestyle. Selling the house shows the loss of her future or her failure and the failure of her life if she does not get a new house, this is an indicator. Success and fulfillment of expectations. An old house in a girl’s dream indicates the collapse of her marriage or that she is marrying a poor man. What is the interpretation of seeing a house sold in a dream to a married woman? A married woman’s dream house indicates a bad relationship between her and her husband, which may lead to separation, so when there If there is a storm and quarrel, she should have a calm conversation with her husband and try to deal with the problems with patience and kindness. . . In the dreams of a married woman, restoring an old house shows patience and perseverance in the face of crises and hardships, while enduring the hardships of life. Interpretation of a dream about selling an old house Selling a house in a man’s dreams means his separation from his wife through death or divorce. Whoever sees him entering a new house, this indicates marriage to an unmarried man. Building a new house indicates a cure for illness. Staying at home means being free from accidents and enjoying good health. Seeing a new house means marriage to a son, daughter, or family member. Moving to a new home means that a man will marry another woman or marry a young man. A dark house shows a woman with bad habits. What is the interpretation of seeing a house sold in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? Demolishing an old house or faith indicates trouble and sadness. Selling an old house may bring illness, death, or separation, sometimes between spouses, business partners, friends, quarrels, and family discord. Building a new home can be bad news. Seeing the construction of houses and forts somewhere indicates stability and happiness, and marriage and sons and daughters indicates the formation of a large family. Read on. In conclusion, we have explained the interpretation of the dream of selling a house in a dream. We hope that you like the article.

title: Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with the husband’s mother and its most important meanings for pregnant and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a quarrel with the mother-in-law and the dream of a quarrel is one of the recurring dreams that many people see in their dreams, whether they are single, married, pregnant or even divorced in a quarrel with their mother-in-law. - In law, because since ancient times until today there are many different disputes between a married woman and her mother-in-law, that is, it is natural to see such dreams in a dream, and so when you see in a dream and they carry in their content many different interpretations and interpretations and their differences are based on many details related to the dream and the dreamer's situation and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream of a quarrel with the mother-in-law and everything related to it. Interpretations and interpretations, as it is one of the dreams that have been searched for repeatedly through search engines. Interpretation of a dream of a quarrel with the mother-in-law of a married woman Just as a quarrel with her mother-in-law or mother-in-law in the life of a married woman is considered one of the natural things that many married women face, and therefore it is natural to see it in a dream because it can be a natural reflection of the normal life they live as a couple as well as her husband's mother, so that she suffers from tension in her relationship with her mother-in-law. The mother-in-law in a married woman's dream is as follows: If a married woman sees that she is arguing with her mother-in-law in her dream, then this vision is an indication that the wife is suffering from many difficulties and pressures, the most important of which is her suffering from psychological oppression and mistreatment. Mother-in-law "the mother of the husband or the mother of the wife. And since this dream indicates the opposite of its facts, that is, seeing it in a dream is an indication that she will be able to solve all her family problems, to restore understanding between her and her husband. Likewise, this vision is evidence of the wife's love for her husband and her dedication to satisfying her husband in his obedience to protect her, and an indication that he does not quarrel with her in real life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a fire in a relative's house in a dream for unmarried women in detail Interpretation of a dream about quarreling with the mother-in-law about a pregnant woman As we know, a pregnant woman during her pregnancy suffers from severe psychological pressure and severe tension during her pregnancy, and therefore she has many different dreams in one dream, as each one of them has many different interpretations and interpretations that differ according to many things. The details related to the dream, the situation of the dream, the dreamer, and the most prominent interpretations of the dream of quarreling with the mother-in-law about a pregnant woman are as follows: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is arguing with her mother-in-law, then this vision is evidence that the pregnant woman will go through a difficult birth, but God Almighty will relieve her of all difficulties and she will give birth to her child in peace. And if her vision is that she is quarreling with her mother-in-law and even gets confused with her hands, then this vision is good news that she will give birth to a male child and that he is strong in build. And a sharp personality. Also, this vision in the life of a pregnant woman is an indication that she is trying to gain her husband's trust and seeks to improve her relationship with her husband and mother-in-law. See

title: I dreamed that I was very angry with Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I was very angry. Urination is the release of excess water from the body, and its retention leads to many health problems for humans. Scientists have interpreted seeing frequent urination in a dream to explain many signs, but the matter differs if the dreamer is a man or a woman or if the urine is in the toilet. Or somewhere else? We will answer these and other questions in the following lines of the article. I dreamed that I was very angry. There were many jurists’ interpretations of the dream of frequent urination, which can be clarified through the following: The dream of urinating frequently symbolizes a feeling of psychological comfort and obtaining a lot of good and nutritional nutrition, in the event that the dreamer He did so with intent, but if it was not intentional on his part, this is a sign of a fine. He will submit. Imam Al-Sadiq - may God have mercy on him - mentioned that if someone sees in a dream that he urinates a lot on his clothes, this is evidence of his inability to face difficulties and think of solutions to them, and the dream may be. It turns into wasting money on worthless things. If you see a lot of urine in an inappropriate place during sleep, this is a sign of revealing secrets and a great feeling of sadness and depression, especially if the smell comes from it. Go to Google and type a site about the secrets of dream interpretation and you will find all the interpretations. Ibn Sirin. I dreamed that I was very angry with Ibn Sirin. One of the most important indications reported by the scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin - may God have mercy on him - is the following: Seeing a poor person urinating a lot in the toilet leads to earning a lot of money, which reflects whether the dreamer is well off. If a person sees during his sleep that he is urinating a lot, this is a sign that great benefit will come to his life and that he will get everything he desires. Whoever dreams that he is urinating on his clothes and the urine is spread everywhere, this is a sign of wasting money on useless things, as the dream symbolizes Indicates that he will face many disagreements in his environment. I dreamed that I was very angry with single women. A dream about urinating a lot on an unmarried girl indicates her outstanding success in the academic and professional field. Seeing many unmarried women’s urinations indicates that God - Glory be to Him - will make everything easy for her. matters in her life and makes her achieve all her dreams that she had been postponing until she overcomes the difficulties she faces. If a girl sees in her dream that she is urinating a lot, this is a sign of abundant nutrition, an abundance of goodness and many benefits that will accrue to her in her life in the coming days. I dreamed that I was very angry From a married woman: When a married woman dreams of a lot of urination in the bed, this is a sign that God Almighty will give her a good son. Some scholars explained that seeing a lot of urine in a married woman’s dream means that she will soon hear good news and that happiness and comfort will enter her life. And dreaming of a lot of urine for a woman For a married woman, it indicates that she will earn a lot of money soon if she is from the middle class and does not have a lot of money, but if she is well-off and wealthy, the dream means that she is extravagant.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing birds in a dream for a single woman married to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing birds in a dream: The dreams and visions that we see in a dream differ. Each dream has interpretations that point to it, and many interpreters have appeared in interpreting dreams that have a major role in preaching the Gospel to many people, and in some visions they may cause anxiety and sadness.. in the interpretation of many Of visions and dreams to discover their good or evil, and in this we discover the interpretation of the dream of seeing birds. Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl sees in a dream many visions and dreams that indicate different signs and associations that may carry good news for her in many visions. Individual birds are each of the following signs: There are many interpretations related to seeing birds in a dream. The translator Ibn Sirin also interpreted seeing birds in a dream for an unmarried girl as evidence of her marriage. It is as if she will marry a man of status, influence, and high status, but she will not feel happy with him. As for Seeing a yellow bird for an unmarried woman is one of the unpleasant visions. It indicates the evil and envy that surrounds this single girl. Also, seeing many birds singing in a dream indicates the dreamer’s joy and happiness in her marriage. The translator Ibn Sirin also contributed to the interpretation of seeing birds in a dream and their courageous voice so that they symbolize stability with the husband. Moreover, it is a sign of the providence of Almighty God. For a married woman. It is also good news of the imminent arrival of a pregnancy that will fill her life with happiness, as it indicates the arrival of good news. See also: Seeing a scorpion in a dream is good news.. Because this marriage will be compensation from God Almighty for the difficult days he suffered. It also explains seeing birds in a dream about a divorced woman, about the approach of hearing good news about her, God willing.
